Roman forgeries, or, A true account of false records discovering the impostures and counterfeit antiquities of the Church of Rome / by a faithful son of the Church of England. Traherne, Thomas, d. 1674.
[35], 316 p.
Printed by S. and B. Griffin, for Jonathan Edwin ..., London : 1673.
Written by T. Traherne. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). First ed. Cf. BM. Errata: p. [15]. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
